mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM track WHERE NUMBER = #{0} AND GPSTIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2}

SELECT NUMBER AS dn, GPSTIME AS gt, SERVERTIME AS st, LNG, LAT, ALT, SPEED AS sp, ANGLE AS d, ALARMS AS a, `STATUS` AS s, MILEAGE AS m, OILMASS AS oil, VSS, OVAREATYPE AS ovt, OVAREAID AS oid, IOAREATYPE AS iot, IOAREAID AS iid, IOAREAFLAG AS iof, ROUTEID AS rid, ROUTESECONDS AS rt, ROUTEFLAG AS rf, ALARMID AS aid, EXSTATUS AS exs, IOSTATUS AS ios, AD0, AD1, NETWORK AS net, SATELLITES AS sat FROM track WHERE NUMBER = #{0} AND GPSTIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2} ORDER BY GPSTIME LIMIT #{3},#{4}
